title: OCE Things - The Support who APCs
body:
Just played against a Velkoz support who thought he was APC. Didn't even get a Sightstone.

We just took everything. OCE Things.

replies.body: at about the 3 kill ks point i say " you go carry im buying supp items"

the support who ADCS

Master Yi supports
Master Yi supports everywhere.

how aids is that aye, Like atleast get this!!!{{item:2301}}  


Filled a game went ADC and this guy goes Ekko sup, (SUPER TOXIC AS WELL MIGHT I ADD) anyway he tells to shut the F**K up i dunno how to support, we dont need wards because we have standard trinket... i cringed so hard lmao
